plate.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: a flat and usually round dish that you eat from or serve food on
plate.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: The plates were piled high with rice.
plate.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: the amount of food that is on a plate
plate.translation[0].definitions[1].exam: He’s eaten a whole plate of french fries.
plate.translation[0].definitions[2].defi: a flat piece of metal with words or numbers on it, for example on a door or a car
plate.translation[0].definitions[2].exam: The brass plate on the door said ‘Dr Rackman’.
Did anyone see the car’s license plate?
plate.translation[0].definitions[3].defi: one of the thin sheets of bone, horn etc that covers and protects the outside of some animals
plate.translation[0].definitions[4].defi: a thin sheet of metal used to protect something
plate.translation[0].definitions[4].exam: The shoes had metal plates attached to the heels.
plate.translation[0].definitions[5].defi: one of the very large sheets of rock that form the surface of the Earth
plate.translation[0].definitions[6].defi: ordinary metal with a thin covering of gold or silver
plate.translation[0].definitions[7].defi: things such as plates, cups, forks, or knives made of gold or silver
plate.translation[0].definitions[8].defi: a sheet of metal that has been cut or treated in a special way so that words or pictures can be printed from its surface
plate.translation[0].definitions[9].defi: a picture in a book, printed on good-quality paper and usually coloured
plate.translation[0].definitions[10].def: a thin sheet of glass used especially in the past in photography, with chemicals on it that are sensitive to light
plate.translation[0].definitions[11].def: the place where the person hitting the ball stands
plate.translation[0].definitions[12].def: a thin piece of plastic shaped to fit inside a person’s mouth, into which false teeth are fixed
plate.translation[0].definitions[13].def: a thin piece of plastic with wires fixed to it, that some people wear in their mouth to make their teeth straight
